text: Ramazan Shamilovich Isayev (; born 17 January 1998) is a Russian football player who plays for FC Lada Dimitrovgrad. ==Career== ===Club career=== He made his professional debut in the Russian Football National League for FC Torpedo Armavir on 12 July 2015 in a game against FC Zenit-2 St. Petersburg. He then played the first half of the 2016–17 season with Radnički Niš. He made 2 appearances with Radnički in the Serbian SuperLiga. On 9 December 2019, Ararat Yerevan announced the signing of Isayev from FC Yerevan on a contract until June 2021. ==References== ==External links== * Player page on the FNL website * Category:1998 births Category:Footballers from Makhachkala Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:FC Armavir players Category:FC Noah players Category:FC Yerevan players Category:FC Dynamo Brest players Category:FK Radnički Niš players Category:Serbian SuperLiga players Category:Belarusian Premier League players Category:Russian Football National League players Category:Armenian Premier League players Category:Association football forwards Category:Russian expatriate sportspeople in Armenia Category:Russian expatriate sportspeople in Belarus Category:Russian expatriate sportspeople in Serbia Category:Expatriate footballers in Armenia Category:Expatriate footballers in Belarus Category:Expatriate footballers in Serbia
title: Ramazan Isayev
